mapper.select: select sum(case when sub.is_correct then 1 else 0 end) as correctCount, count(ea.id) as totalCount from public.examinations_answers ea left join lateral ( select tv.is_correct from tests_variants tv where tv.id = ea.variant_id ) as sub on true where examination_id = #{examinationId}
mapper.insert: insert into public.examinations_statistics(testing_id, user_id, last_percentage, best_percentage) values (#{entity.testingId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.lastPercentage}, #{entity.bestPercentage})
mapper.select: select es.id as id, es.last_percentage as lastPercentage, es.best_percentage as bestPercentage, t.id as testingId, e.id as examId, e.title as examTitle, s.id as specializationId, s.title as specializationTitle from public.examinations_statistics es left join public.testings t on t.id = es.testing_id left join public.exams e on e.id = t.exam_id left join public.specializations s on s.id = t.specialization_id where es.user_id = #{userId}
